TopicTitle: [AAR] BaseCamp- A Journey to Space -- WARNING: IMAGE HEAVY

Articles.Content: Sovereign!! All the references... The swarm need to say "We are legion" at some point! :D
Sphere eaters.... monoliths... Come back Discovery, all is forgiven! Just don't let one of those things drop into Jool! "It's shrinking... It's shrinking!"
I can only wait for Vogons, Martin or Pangalactic Gargle Buster!
Tsk, for shame! Gargle Blasters! All the poor poor wee slices of lemon out of a job. Tis a shame, a shame!

Tsk, for shame! Gargle Blasters! All the poor poor wee slices of lemon out of a job. Tis a shame, a shame!

Blaster? Well i am polsih so i tried to translate it somehow and also checked in internet. Internet is wrong!

HAhahahaha! SWARM is oging to be destroyed by Sphere eaters! I jsut can't resist laughing, because they were always scaring Kerbals and now an artifact will destroy them. I don't even known what was so funny in this i just can't resist laughing!
Nice chapter, when will be the next one?

Weekend or Monday- I am a college student, so most if my time is monopolized by classes.

great chapter, and the irony, as cziken20 said, is great........... Will this cause swarm to work with kerbals!!!

Perhaps... Then again, there has been no significant declaration of war between the swarm and Kerbals in this timeline...

Sovereign!! All the references... The swarm need to say "We are legion" at some point! :D

I think they have already done that.

Sphere eaters.... monoliths... Come back Discovery, all is forgiven! Just don't let one of those things drop into Jool! "It's shrinking... It's shrinking!"

Something like that.

I can only wait for Vogons, Martin or Pangalactic Gargle Buster!
Tsk, for shame! Gargle Blasters! All the poor poor wee slices of lemon out of a job. Tis a shame, a shame!
Blaster? Well i am polsih so i tried to translate it somehow and also checked in internet. Internet is wrong!

It's like having your brain smashed out of your skull wrapped around a large gold brick.

*Like having your brain smashed out of your skull, by a slice of lemon wrapped 'round a large gold brick.

Also: Never have more than two pan-galactic gergle blasters unless you are a 30-ton mega elephant with bronchial pneumonia.

Weekend or Monday- I am a college student, so most if my time is monopolized by classes.

I think they have already done that.

My bad, then. But even so... it even looks like Sovereign! Sorry. Little bit of a flip-out. All done now. Regardless, keep up the good work!!

Edited March 27, 2014 by nianor

It's like having your brain smashed out of your skull wrapped around a large gold brick.

With a Lemon! Tisk, young whippersnappers today have no consideration of the classics! *goes muttering off to himself on a zimmer frame* Am I too old if I listened to the original on the radio when I was a kid? *sigh*

With a Lemon! Tisk, young whippersnappers today have no consideration of the classics! *goes muttering off to himself on a zimmer frame* Am I too old if I listened to the original on the radio when I was a kid? *sigh*

Well don't worry. You are too old onlt if you saw the first world war.

Next chapter- Tuesday.

(I have a large project due Tuesday, so I need the time.)

Jeb gets to unveil his latest experiment.... FTL that a kerbal might just survive.

For rescue missions- and plot stuff.

Edited March 31, 2014 by Mekan1k
Cool. Warp drives 'n' stuff.
Well : NO JEBEDIAH NO! YOU GONNA DIE NOOOOO!

Jeb? Die? That Kerbal could win a 1v1 with the Kraken! If he dies the universe disassembles itself!

And then reassembles when he shows up at KSC a few days later.

Well : NO JEBEDIAH NO! YOU GONNA DIE NOOOOO!
Jeb? Die? That Kerbal could win a 1v1 with the Kraken! If he dies the universe disassembles itself!

And then reassembles when he shows up at KSC a few days later.

He is a main character- like the doctor!

Another postponement- With 0.23.5 released, I need to re-upgrade all the mods to the next level.

That, and my internet being so unstable I can't really use it much is severely impairing my progress on the next chapter.

Another postponement- With 0.23.5 released, I need to re-upgrade all the mods to the next level.

That, and my internet being so unstable I can't really use it much is severely impairing my progress on the next chapter.

As far as i understand it should work if mods only add parts or interiors. So not that much mods now.

I apologize for this, but life is causing me more and more problems- not the least of which is inter-webs.

Next chapter pics:

Will there be a Kerbonaut coming from Russia? He would be my favourite character!

This thing makes me think of kraken drives. I just don't know why. Maybe it's because i tried building them in such a way like this thing here.

Looks like a jump drive or something.

Fun stuff ahead!
I think of the Pheonix from Star Trek when I look at that thing. Will it be launched on top of a surplus launch vehicle?

Will there be a Kerbonaut coming from Russia? He would be my favourite character!

This thing makes me think of kraken drives. I just don't know why. Maybe it's because i tried building them in such a way like this thing here.

It isn't a kraken-drive, but there will be an explanation of why soon.

Looks like a jump drive or something.

Fun stuff ahead!

Accurate guess on the first try!

I think of the Pheonix from Star Trek when I look at that thing. Will it be launched on top of a surplus launch vehicle?

Yup- but the ksp has a lot of surplus launch vehicles- big ones too.
I mean an ICBM look alike type launch vehicle.

I mean an ICBM look alike type launch vehicle.
